TopicTitle: Fuel transfer - Even amounts in each tank

Articles.Content:
when transferring fuel between tanks (from a single large centre to many small outer) i need to be able to get an equal amount in each of the small tanks... but cant

Furthermore, i want to get the ratio of oxidiser to propellant right... but i cant with out doing it manually.

any trick to get it right?

Yeah I hope Squad do something to help here.

Other than using a mod, the best I could suggest is filling small tanks to get known quantities before moving the fuel to the target tanks.
